item.title: Huey Lewis & The News - Stuck With You
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Keys of C & D.
Chords Used: C, Am7, F, Dm, G, Am, Em, A, D, Bm7
As performed by Huey Lewis and the News.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/FaNEwVl1sR0
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Dave Matthews Band - Sweet
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of D. (Transposed down one half step from the original recording).
Chords Used: G, D, Bm, A, Em, Dsus4, Bm7
As performed by the Dave Matthews Band.
I'd like to dedicate this play along to my friend and former colleague, Rick, who is a massive DMB fan and has attended more than twenty-five DMB concerts!
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/EDYW9HrCb5U
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6

item.title: Simon & Garfunkel - Scarborough Fair / Canticle
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of E Dorian (built on the second step of the D Major scale)
Chords Used: Em, D, G, A
As performed by Simon & Garfunkel
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/M0x_G4eA71w
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The art work is by Pieter Brueghel the Younger (1534-1638) and is entitled "Flemish Fair."
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff

item.title: Mama Cass - Dream A Little Dream Of Me
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Dream A Little Dream Of Me - The Mamas & The Paps Music by Fabian Andre and Wilbur Schwandt and lyrics by Gus Kahn
Using the chords: A A7 Bm B7 C E7 F Fm F#m G7 Ab
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or DU DU DU DU
This is not an easy play along but with lots of practice it is very playable and devinitely worth the work.
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: The Dixie Cups - Chapel Of Love
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of D. (Original Key)
Chords Used: D, Em, A, B7
As performed by The Dixie Cups.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/XNvFL6cqDi0
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Motion background from www.videvo.net.

item.title: Jason Mraz - I Won't Give Up
item.description:
Ukulele play along
I Won't Give Up - Jason Mraz
Using the chords: A Bm7 C C# D Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU or D DU U (or a combination of both)
Notes: The audio has been slightly lowered (1 tone) to make it more suitable for the ukulele
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Now United - All Day
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Bm (Transposed down a half step from the original).
Chords Used: G, A, F#m, Bm
As performed by Now United.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/tZEklY1fgdQ
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Motion background from motionbolt.com.

item.title: Bryan Adams - Summer Of '69
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Summer Of '69 - Bryan Adams
Using the chords: A Bb Bm C D F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU DU or D DU U DU but try your own out too!
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: OneRepublic - Rescue Me
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Bm. In the original key.
Chords Used: Bm, A, D, G
As performed by OneRepublic. This was a request from my own two boys, age 7 & 10. If you read this comments, they would be thrilled if you watched some of their videos and followed them.
Older son: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnXyBzSlqfs_N0Sz8EeTj7Q Younger son: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLCD1tFgLd6rgT1WzdR4paA
And if you are reading all of this, please follow my other ukulele channel: https://www.youtube.com/ukestuff As these videos cannot be monetized, subscriptions and views on the other channel really will help me out.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/JZA5jnT4brY
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion video is from churchmediadrop.com
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.

Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: The Beach Boys - I Can Hear Music
item.description:
Ukulele play along
I Can Hear Music - The Beach Boys
Using the chords: A A7 D D7 Em F#m G Gm
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU or DU DU DU DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
